Allen Iverson returned to the game. Rasheed Wallace 's 3-pointer with 10.4 seconds left ended a nearly 7-minute scoring drought. Richard Hamilton 's two free throws with 3.8 seconds to go avoided a monumental collapse from a 29-point third-quarter lead. Honestly, I didn't want to go back in, said Allen Iverson , who scored 20 points through three quarters.`` I felt that our second team should have closed that thing out.'' His senior defensive end/linebacker Jarrell McKinney signed with Western Michigan.`` He's my first Division I recruit,'' the Albert said of Jarrell McKinney . He has tremendous speed. He runs the 40 in 4.5. He's 6-5, 210, and when he goes to college they're going to put another 20-30 pounds on him. Playing defensive end, he's going to be outstanding. He's the role model for our other kids.... He's that bar that we have to set for ourselves.
